masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"The blizzard hit faster than predicted—we've got 200 people trapped in the mall! Roads are impassable, the parking structure is buried, and the food court is running out of supplies. Some people are panicking. We need help keeping order and maybe a way out."

Requirements

  • Help maintain order among stranded shoppers
  • Find supplies—food, blankets, medicine for those who need it
  • Create an escape route or wait out the storm safely
